metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22402 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SOGo Web Mail before 4.3.1allows attackers to obtain user sensitive information when a user reads anemail containing malicious code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sogo - 4.3.2-1
sogo-activesync - 4.3.2-1
sogo-common - 4.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sogo package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1').
